EmailTemplate.description: email from Liz to TeamMate trials (post-trial)
EmailTemplate.name: TeamMate Trials follow up
EmailTemplate.subject: Checking in from Compliance Week
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
%%First Name%%,
Hey! It was a pleasure meeting you at TeamMate a couple weeks ago!
Thanks for stopping by the booth and signing up for the free trial. I hope you had a chance to check out the site and play with some of the filters.
If you are interested in subscribing, let me know by Oct. 15th (reply to this to this email for the $599 conference rate, for new subscribers only).
Do you have any questions about the site or benefits of beginning a subscription? I look forward to staying in touch.
Cheers,
Liz Koch lkoch@complianceweek.com
Senior Marketing Manager | Compliance Week 77N. Washington St., Boston MA 02114 617-570-8602 | www.complianceweek.com www.complianceweek.com
